item.title: Trump idea to buy beef from Argentina will hurt U.S. ranchers, GOP Sen. warns
item.description: Fischer encouraged the Trump administration "to focus on trade deals that benefit our ag producers—not imports that will do more harm than good."

item.title: Trump Jan. 6 pardon recipient accused of threatening to kill Democratic leader Jeffries
item.description: Christopher Moynihan, of Clinton, is charged with making a terroristic threat against Hakeem Jeffries, the House Minority Leader.

item.title: China says U.S. and Australia 'should play a proactive role' to bolster rare earths supply chains
item.description: China’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs on Tuesday said resource-rich countries should play a proactive role in bolstering their rare earth supply chains.
